official_title: To amend title 13, United States Code, to make clear that no sampling or other statistical procedure may be used in determining the total population by States for purposes of the apportionment of Representatives in Congress.

summary.text: Prohibits sampling or other statistical procedures from being used to determine the total population by States with respect to the decennial census for purposes of the apportionment of Representatives in the Congress among the several States.
